info.title: SwitchFishing (Demo)
info.author: Mrow
info.description: A port of the Webfishing itchio demo!
info.details:
Hai, i randomly decided to make this as i miss Webfishing and i wanted it on my switch. This is the full demo of webfishing.

Port Dev: Mrow
Original Dev: Lamedev

The default controls are:

- Up/Down/Left/Right: left joystick
- Equip/Unequip Fishin Rod/: X button
- Deploy Fishing Rod/Wave: A button
- Sprint: B button
- Camera Right: R button
- Camera Left: L button
- Pause Menu: + button
- Silly Dance: - button
- Sitting: Down D-pad

For more info visit my github <3 ( github.com/mrowfishing )
